problem_text_cn: 如图,P是⊙O外一点,PO交⊙O于C点,PA和PB分别切⊙O于A和B点,已知⊙O的半径为3cm,∠APB=60°．若用图中阴影部分的扇形围成一个圆锥的侧面,则这个圆锥的高为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, P is a point outside ⊙O, PO intersects ⊙O at point C, and PA and PB tangent ⊙O at points A and B respectively. It is known that the radius of ⊙O is N_0, ∠APB = N_1. If the sector of the shaded part in the figure is used to enclose the lateral surface of a cone, the height of the cone is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵PA和PB分别切⊙O于A和B点,∠APB=60°,∴∠AOB=120°,∵半径为3cm,∴扇形的弧长为\frac{120π×3}{180}=2π,∴圆锥的底面半径为2π÷2π=1,∴圆锥的高为√{3^{2}-1^{2}}=2√{2}cm,故选:A．
raw_comment: 本题考查了切线的性质及圆锥的计算,解题的关键是能够求得扇形的圆心角的度数并求得扇形的弧长,难度不大．
